text.*:
1938 World Men's Handball Championship
Tournament details
Host country  Germany
Final positions
Champions  Germany
Runner-up  Austria
Third place  Sweden
Next →

The 1938 World Men's Handball Championship was the first ever team handball World Championship. It was played in Germany on 5 and 6 February 1938. Contested by just 4 national teams, the tournament was won by hosts Germany.

Contents

  • 1 Final standings
  • 2 Final round
  • 3 Point Table
  • 4 Medallist Squads
  • 5 External links

 Germany

4  Denmark

Final round[edit]

Match Result
 Germany -  Denmark 11-3
 Sweden -  Denmark 2-1
 Germany -  Sweden 7-2
 Austria -  Sweden 5-4
 Germany -  Austria 5-4
 Austria -  Denmark 7-2

3  Sweden 2 1 0 2 8 13 -5
4  Denmark 0 0 0 3 6 20 -14
